Osc. Oscar stops in his tracks.

You gonna give me a reason to? Sophina doesn't answer. The phone rings again. Oscar's ha quickly picks it up and flips it open. We follow the phon his face and we see him for the first time, a 22 year old Black man with a warm smile.
(into phone)

Aye bruh it's bad tonight. I gotta catch you tomorrow. He closes it before the guy on the other end can respond. takes the phone with him as he climbs back into bed with SOPHINA MESA, a curvy 24 year old Mexican American woman.
Look, I'm not going out, you happy now? Sophina nods. Oscar moves closer to her and kisses her on neck. She kisses him back a bit, then scoots away. Oscar kisses her again. Puts his hand in her hair.
Osc. Osc, hold up. Oscar stops. Sophina scoots away even further.
Man, wussup? I been home hella long...
I don't know...Every time you touch me, I can't help to think about how you was touchin that Bitch. Oscar shakes his head at this, sighs.

What I gotta do? I'm here, right now. I fucked up one time, alright?
No, you fucking got caught, one time. You gonna sit here and tell me that was the first time you kicked it with that Bitch. Never seen her before that huh?
Look I'm done with that shit. All I want is you and T, forever. Sophina looks at him, searching for the truth in his eyes
What you mean, forever?
Let me show you. Oscar kisses her, moves in. Sophina scoots away from him. KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK. Oscar and Sophina look over at the doo
Daddy. Oscar looks at Sophina.
What? She's askin for you.
(to child)

Hold on, T. Oscar jumps up and grabs the bag of weed off of the dress and hides it in the closet. He rushes over and opens the door where we see TATIANA GR a cute 4 year old girl, standing wearing footie pajamas.
I can't sleep... Before Tatiana can even finish, Oscar has her in his arms brings her over to the bed and places her next to Sophina
You want to sleep in here with Mommy and Daddy? Tatiana nods.
You know better than that T. (to Oscar)
What time is it? Oscar picks up his phone and looks at it.
Damn, it's after midnight. He opens his phone up. Presses compose text message (as h types the message, the words appear as graphics across th screen like Sub Titles)
Oscar sends the text off. He hooks his phone up to the charger and hits the light switch, leaving us in darkness
Daddy.
Wussup, baby?
I don't want to move to Livermore. Oscar and Sophina laugh at this.

Hella nosy...
Don't worry T, aint nobody's moving right now. Go to sleep.
Oscar stands in the shower, letting the water run over hi head. There looks to be a lot on his mind.
Sophina and Oscar move around the small kitchen like a we oiled machine. Sophina, wearing a WalMart uniform, makes lunches. Oscar wipes milk from Tatiana's face and fixes h hair.
Mommy can I have two of the fruit snacks today?
No, T. You can take an extra apple if you want.
But mommy I-
Don't argue T. Tatiana pouts. Sophina downs a cup full of orange juice, grabs both lunch bags, Tatiana, and heads for the door.
Com'on Osc. We gotta stop and get gas too.
We got enough to get yall there. Sophina shoots Oscar a look.
Go start the car up. You got your keys?
Sophina nods.
Go. I gotta grab my beanie. Sophina and Tatiana leave. Oscar watches them go for a be He turns to the cabinet.

STACY a motherly looking Black woman in her 50's ope the door.
Good morning Tatiana!
Good morning Mrs. Stacy. Tatiana heads into the house. Oscar smiles at Mrs. Stacey, and she nods back. He watche Tatiana run off into house.

text: Oscar and Sophina look on at the WAL MART Entrance.

See? Told you we'd make it. The light aint even on yet. She looks at the dashboard where there is a PICTURE of Os holding Tatiana tucked in the glass. The fuel gage sits almost under E, but the light still isn't on. She stares at the store entrance.
You gonna go home and sleep, right?
Naw, Imma go up to the job. Get some stuff for tonight.
Ugh. I'd rather die than come here on my day off. (beat)
What time we supposed to be at your grandma's?
Prolly like seven.
We gonna go to Frisco again? Catch the fireworks? Oscar nods. Sophina smiles at the idea of Frisco, for a b
Let me get in here.
She quickly sits up. Oscar leans over to give her a kiss the cheek, makes a farting sound on her neck instead. Sophina chuckles at this as she gets out of the car.
Bye.
(playfully)
Love you too. SLAM! Sophina shuts the door on him. Oscar laughs. His sm fades, as he watches her go inside.

Oscar, now in the car by himself rides in the car listeni to HIP HOP MUSIC. He comes to a red light. He looks at the car radio clock: 8:58 AM. He thinks to himself for a beat, he looks dissatisfied. H turns his music up for a beat and listens to it. He looks around, still not at ease. He turns off his music and pul out his cellphone. He takes a quick look around to see wh cars are around, before dialing numbers. CALLING MOM flas on the screen. He holds the phone to his ear.

A beautiful Black woman in her late 40's wears a UPS manager's uniform, this is WANDA JOHNSON. She walks towar the entrance of her store, when her cellphone rings in he purse. She pulls it out, stressed. Answers it without looking.
Hello?
Last shot right here, you sure you want to work on your birthday? You still got time to catch a cold... Wanda's face brightens up with a familiar looking smile.
Hello Son! Thanks for the text last night.
No problem. Come on, let's go celebrate right now.
Wanda laughs at this.
As tempting as that sounds... this place would be a mess without me today. (beat)
We close early though...
Okay...You still want me to get a couple crabs, right?
Yes, and can you pick some... are you driving?
Yeah Ma.
You wearing your earpiece? Oscar hesitates for a beat.
Yeah...
Don't lie to me. That's all you need is to get pulled over right now. Put your earpiece on, Oscar. Oscar sighs... this is nothing new.
Hold on. He pulls the car over. He looks around for his earpiece for beat- no luck. He ta his cellphone, and slides it into the elastic of his bean a poor man's Bluetooth. He pulls off.
Hello?
It's on now?
Yeah Ma.
Okay pick up a couple of packets of dried shrimp too. Come by on your way, I'll give you the money.
Nah Ma, it's good.
Alright I'll pay you back tonight.
Ma, don't trip off that. I got you. Wanda pauses for a beat.
Okay, so you're buying this, with Farmer Joe's money... right?
Ye-
Because that's the only kind of money you have right now... right?
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Yeah Ma, and I'm gonna use my discount.
Okay, well let me run in here. I'll see you later tonight.
Love you.
Love you too.
Wanda hangs up the phone. She looks at it for a beat. The puts it back in her purse and heads into the warehouse.

text: It is a moderately sized grocery store, but several SHOPP move about the aisles. Oscar walks over to the seafood section where Cato CALDWELL, a 22 year old charismatic Bl male stands behind the counter wearing a Deli apron. Cato sees Oscar and smiles brightly. He takes a pile of f off the scale, bags it, ands it to an older BLACK WOMAN. takes off his clear glove and slaps hands with Oscar over counter.
Sup Osc, bruh?
Shit. What's good?
You lookin for Emi?
Yeah. He here today?
Hell yeah he is. He was just over here...
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Cato looks around at the surrounding aisles. No signs of
I came to get some crabs too.

Oh yeah, tell Moms I said Happy Birthday. I had meant to call her this morning.
You should come through grandma house tonight.
Bruh I wish I could, but I gotta bust a couple moves tonight. What's good for the countdown though?

Frisco. Fireworks and the whole shit- Oscar sees something out of the corner of his eye. He mot his head for Cato to look. Cato turns and sees- KATIE, a White girl in her mid 20's, playing with her iPh while waiting for help. Cato quickly makes his way over.
You ready?
Uh, yeah... I want to get a pound of, wait... Can I see what your sole looks like?
Sole? Cato takes a sidestep over to his left and motions to a p of fish.
Yeah, no, wait. Your catfish. Let me see what that looks like.... Cato points to the catfish. Katie looks at it, then looks down to her phone.
Okay but, I want to fry it. Like a fish fry. Are these the ones you can fry? Cato gives her an "are you serious?" look.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)                            14A.
Every fish we sell here can be fried.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Katie looks at him, still flustered.
Okay, let me have a second. She looks back down at her iPhone, and takes a step back. Cato turns to Oscar.
What you need for moms, bruh?
Let me get three Dungeness. Cato nods and walks over to the crab.
Fat ones too, bruh.
Bet. Oscar turns to Katie.
Your family having a fish fry for New Years or something? Katie looks up from her phone, a bit caught off guard.
Ahh, yeah. Something like that.
It's cool. I work here. She looks at Oscar suspiciously.
It's my day off. Katie smiles nervously. Looks at Cato who nods at Katie i approval.
Oh, okay. (beat)

Well, I'm cooking dinner tonight for my friend, before we go to the city. And he really likes fried fish, like southern style. And I maybe lied a bit, and said that I know how to cook like that. Oscar laughs at this. Katie shakes her head.
Is he black?
What? Who?
Your boyfriend. Katie blushes.
He's white. But he knows a lot of black people... He's not my boyfriend either... Oscar chuckles at this.
Katie looks down at her phone again. She uses her fingers zoom in on something.

I'm not sure what type of fish he wants. And most of these recipes are different on this site. Oscar watches her with a look of pity. Suddenly, an idea flashes before his eyes. He pulls out his cellphone, quickly dials a number, and h it to his ear.
We see GRANDMA BONNIE, a black woman in her early 70's , putting flowers into a vase on her kitchen counter. A cordless phone RINGS on the counter. She looks at the p for a beat then she cheers up.
(into phone)
Hello?
Oscar holds his cellphone and snaps at Katie to get her attention.
Grandma...
Oscar? What's going on Baby?
I'm at my job, and this girl here-
You say you're at work?
Well, yeah....
Boy you know better than to be talking on the phone while you're at work! Bye!
Grandma, Grandma, I'm off today. I'm just shopping for the party.
Oh, I thought you were up there playing on the phone.
Naw grandma. But I got this girl here, she wants to fry fish for her boyfriend, but she don't know how. You think you could tell her what she needs to know and everything?
Oh no problem, baby. What kind of fish does she want to fry?
(to Katie)
What type of F--, wait.. (into phone)
She don't know.
What you mean she don't know? Put her on the phone.
(into phone)
Hold on. Oscar holds out the phone for Katie. She reaches out apprehensively. He gives her a reassuring look. She takes
(whispering)
What's her name?
(whispering back)
Grandma Bonnie.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
(into phone) Hello, Grandma Bonnie, it's Katie, Nice to meet you.
Katie smiles and blocks her other ear to hear better.
Pssst!

Oscar snaps his head to Cato, who motions for Oscar to lo down the aisle. Oscar looks over and sees, EMI, a thirtysomething Hispani man wearing a white collared shirt and a name tag. He che the shelves with a barcode scanning device. Oscar slowly heads over.
Good morning, Emi.
Oscar, what's going on??
Had to grab some stuff for my Mom's birthday.
I hope you found everything that you need.
Emi turns and starts for the next aisle.
Emi, hold up man, I wanted to talk to you.
It's a little nuts right now, holiday and all. But what's up?
Long beat.
I just want... (beat)
I need my job back. I need my job back.
Position's been filled. Take care man. Emi turns to head down the aisle, Oscar reaches out and g Emi by his sleeve. Emi stops and turns around.

Look, I was going through some shit, trying to get back on my feet. But I need this job man. I'll show up early every day. You can start me back off with one shift a week or whatever. I'm here. You can work me 40 hours a week and pay me for 20. I'm here.

Oscar, dude. I hired somebody else. For me to hire you back, that means I have to let someone else go. Someone with no felonies. Who's never showed up late once. I like you man, but I can't do that. I'm sorry. If something else opens up, maybe I'll let you know. Take care of yourself. Emi walks away. Oscar watches him.
Hey! Oscar turns around to find Katie, holding out his phone f him to take. Oscar looks at her basket, it's now full of and supplies.
You sure you got enough?
Oh my god, Your grandmother is so sweet! I can't believe she was kind enough to do that.
Trust me. She's happy to help.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)                                  22
Thank you so much... Katie by the way. She extends her hand to shake with Oscar. Oscar smiles, shakes it.
Oscar.
Oscar... like the Grouch!! Oscar shakes his head at this. Katie starts off towards t register.
Take care. Oscar's nods. He walks back over to Cato, who is weighing fish for another CUSTOMER. He spots Oscar.
How it go? Oscar smiles wide and nods. He reaches over the counter a grabs the bag of crabs, then bumps fists with Cato.
That's wussup bruh! Imma hit you tonight! Yall can ride with me. Oscar nods and heads towards the checkout line, his smile fading.

text: Oscar places the bag of crabs in the refrigerator. He clo it and looks at the refrigerator for a beat. On it we see several drawings done by Tatiana held on the door by magn Oscar smiles at these. His phone rings: BIG SIS CALLING
Chantay, a 25 year old Black woman, wearing a KFC employe uniform pinches a cellphone between her ear and her shoul She organizes papers in a folder while she talks into the phone.
Hey, chump! What you doin?
At the house, just got back from the job.
I thought you were off today.
I am.
Oh... You call mom yet?
Yup.
Oh okay. I got good news and bad news. Oscar thinks for a bit.
Bad news first.
I need help with the rent for this month.
How much?
Like $300. I'll get you back in a couple of weeks.
Okay. What's the good news.
I'm working overtime tonight.
What? That's fucking bad news too.
No it's not. Double time and a half.
C'mon Chantay.
Hey, gotta do it. Moms understands. But I need you to get her a card and sign it for me.
Aight.
And Osc, don't get me a fake ass card with white people on it. I want a black card. And not one of those joke cards either.
Aight. I got you.
Thank you Oscar, love you.
Love you too, scrub.
Bye. Oscar closes his phone. Thinks to himself for a beat. He opens his phone back up and punches some numbers. Calling Marcus flashes across the screen.

MARCUS, a tough looking Asian- American man about Oscar's sits in a barber's chair, A Black BARBER cuts his hair. H phone vibrates in his pocket, and the Barber steps back t let him answer it. He pulls out an iPhone and talks into
Wussup wit it, Osc?
Wussup bruh? My bad about last night. You still tryna get that?
Yeah, but I aint out that way. Imma be in the Town all day. Oscar takes a beat.
Shit bruh I can come to you.
Okay... Meet me over there by the water bruh. Right off of 80. I'll be over there in like a hour.
Aight, bet.
Bet. Oscar hangs up his phone. Green (7/5/2012)
Oscar quickly walks over to his closet and grabs the bag weed. He neatens up the room a bit, and takes off.

The store is small and brightly lit. Oscar is reading a c from off the BIRTHDAY FOR MOTHER rack. We see that on the card is a picture of a black woman wal on the beach holding her son's hand. Inscribed over it ar the words to the religious poem "Footsteps" by Anonymous. Oscar's eyes quickly scan the poem: he's read it before. Oscar opens the card, and looks inside for a beat. He loo up, moved by the words. He stares off into space.

location: VISITING ROOM- SAN QUENTIN CORRECTIONAL FACIL

text: We look through a foggy window at Wanda sitting at one of several large wooden tables with plastic chairs placed ar them. There are a few VISITORS already sitting at tables inmates. Several Corrections Officers stand by. We see Oscar, shirtless, arms behind his head, is looking through the glass window of the search room. A Correction Officer is conducting a search. Oscar's face is bruised u his left eye, and there is a small white bandage strip on left side of his face. He turns around, bends over and coughs. He turns back around, and the officer hands him h Blue shirt and pants. Oscar puts them on and- BUZZ. The door opens, and Oscar walks through the large r to Wanda's table. As he approaches she stands up.
Hey Ma. Oscar gives her a hug, leaning across the table.
What happened to your face?
You look nice. Wanda shakes her head.
My girls come over last night? Wanda nods. Laughs a bit.
We played board games.
"Candyland"? Wanda nods. Laughing a bit more now.
Yall let her win too, I bet.
Of course.
Yall hella weak for that. She gets no easy victories with me around. Oscar smiles and notices Wanda is smiling about something her mind.
What?
Do you remember that microwave popcorn you bought a while back?
Yeah, the kettle corn. Hella good.
Yes, kettle corn. I popped some of that for us, and I was putting it into a bowl. Tatiana's looking up at me, like she wants something. Wanda starts to chuckle a bit again.
C'mon. What she say?
She looks up at me and says,"Grandma, do we have any dark butter?" Oscar looks at Wanda with a confused look.
Dark butter?

Yeah, I'm thinking she saw "Food Network" or something. So I say, "what's dark butter sweetheart?" She says, "When Daddy took me to see WALL.E he asked for light butter, so I want to try some dark butter this time." Oscar looks at Wanda with a bright eyed expression.
She is gettin way too smart. Another BUZZ from the door is heard.
As the two share a moment, DANIEL CALE, a stocky white in in his early 30's walks past Oscar and Wanda's table. He a large, square bandage under his left eye.
(just loud enough for Oscar to hear)
This moms right here? Anger flashes over Oscar's eyes.
She a snitch to?
What? What the Fuck you say about my Mom bruh?
Oscar!
Fuck you and that bitch.
You tough in here with these guards huh? Two Corrections Officers move quickly over to Oscar's tab Cale, continues to walk towards a the table with the Woma and the Frizzy Haired Girl.
Is there a problem here?
Naw, we good.

That's my best friend right there. Cale flashes a mischievous smile. The Corrections Officer comes over and stands between the two. Oscar watches as Cale sits down across from the woman, wh holds the baby. Cale smiles at the woman, and makes cooch coo faces at the baby.
Woman passes the child to Cale over the table. Oscar looks on with malice.
Oscar, Calm down. Wanda's voice snaps the anger off of his face. He looks back to Wanda, and his anger subsides.
What happened to your face?
Dark butter huh? She always listening. Wanda stares at Oscar.
She too smart for her own good man. The preschool said we should think about starting her in school early. Phina tell you that? Wanda doesn't respond.

Yeah, we're gonna put her in private school. I was lookin at St. Bede the other day. It's this other school that starts them off learning Spanish, then it gradually gets them back going on English. It's like a new thing-
I'm not coming to see you anymore. Oscar stops in his tracks.
What you mean?
I'm not coming here, to these visits anymore. This is the last time.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)                                  31
I know I know I know. This is my last time too. I told you that. I ain't goin down no more.
You want to keep putting Sophina through this... go ahead. But Tatiana doesn't deserve this. She didn't have a choice. Oscar takes this in.
She too young to know what's going on right now.
I guess that's why she asked me why you love taking your vacations more than being with her. Oscar cut his eyes from Wanda.
She aint say that.
So I'm the liar now. Oscar takes a beat to think about this.
Tell her that I love her more than anything in the world. And that I-
Tell her yourself. Next time you call. Tell your daughter how much you love her over the phone. Or better yet, just let her come visit you?
I don't want her to see me like this.
Like what?
In a box.
But this is how you are right now.
I don't want her to be exposed to this.
You've already exposed her to it! Wanda leans back in her chair- she's done.
So you really not gonna visit me no more? I got four more months!! Oscar leans in.
(whispering)
Ma, this shit aint like Rita. It's crazy in here. I don't know if I can make it without you seeing you that long.
I love you Oscar, I'm praying for you, and I'll see you when you get home. Wanda scoots back in her chair, stands up, and heads towa the exit.
Oscar remains seated in his chair.
Ma, hold up. Let me get a hug. Wanda continues to walk. Oscar stands up, and follows beh Wanda. His feet pass a yellow line.
Ma! Wanda continues on, not turning around.
Ma! Hold up! The C.O. sees this.

Grant, back in your assigned visiting area. Oscar ignores him, and continues to follow his Mom. The C.O. hits a button on his walkie, and motions to the other C.O.'s. They quickly move towards Oscar and attempt grab him.
Get the fuck off me! Oscar jerks away.
Ma! The C.O.'s grab Oscar and lift him up off of the ground.
Get off me! Ma! Ma! Wanda continues on.
Ma. Ma! Hold up! (to C.O.'s)

Let me just give her a hug right quick before she leave! We pull back with Wanda as she walks away, trying to hide pain. Another Corrections Officer sprints past her toward Oscar, who we can still see in the distance.
Ma! Ma! (to the C.O.s)
Get the fuck off me! (to Wanda)
Ma! Ma! Oscar looks on at Wanda as she leaves, growing small in t distance.
Oscar still stares off into space, moved by this memory. snaps out of it, heads towards the register with the card hand.
Oscar starts the car up, looks at his dashboard. He sees the fuel light is on. Pink (6/25/2012)                                      35-
Oscar pumps his gas. He looks at a poster of Obama that r CHANGE, posted on the gas pump. He looks across the lot a notices a Zales engagement ring poster. He pulls out his phone. Starts to text.

Shit! No, No, No Stop! SCHREECH... BAM! We hear it before we see it. A sickening sound. An animal YELPS, a car SPEEDS OFF. Oscar runs into street chasing a car going too fast for us to see.
(at the car)

Hey! Stop you bitch ass Muthafucka!! He stops, turns around, and runs over to something lying the street. It's the dog, and he's in bad shape. Oscar pi the dog up out of the street, and places him on the sidew

Shit. (shouting)
Somebody help! Somebody fucking Help!

Oscar continues to pet his head. The dog starts to violen shake... He becomes unnaturally still. Oscar stares at the Dog for a long beat, shaken up by thi He looks around, no one seems to have noticed. He bends down, closes the Dog's eyes, and heads for his c

text: It is an empty parking lot next to a beautiful view of th Bay. Oscar's car pulls up. After a short beat. A Lexus pu up along side of it. Marcus hops out of the Lexus and wal over to Oscar's car.
Oscar leans over and opens the passenger side door for Ma to get in.
Shit bruh I didn't think we was ever gonna link up. You been good? Oscar stares out of the window.
I got good news and bad news my nigg.
Awww naw, Osc bruh, don't tell me you aint got it.
Sold it to a white boy bruh.
Awww Osc. For how much?
Gave me a rack for it. Marcus makes a face.
No way I was goin that high. Shit bruh. I needed that though... What's the good news? Oscar turns to Marcus hands him a brown pre- rolled joint
For your troubles.
Right on Osc bruh. He pulls out a wad of money.
It's good bruh. Take it.
You sure? Oscar nods.
Right on bruh. Marcus pulls out a lighter.
Burn one with ya boy right quick. Marcus lights up the joint, takes a hit, holds it out for Oscar, but Oscar just stares out of the Window.
I'm good, that's all you bruh. Marcus puts it back into his mouth.
Right on Osc, then bruh. They slap hands, and Marcus gets out of the car. We hear get into his car, and start his car up. Oscar waits for a beat. He then reaches under his seat and grabs something.
Oscar walks out onto the shoreline, looking at the water. looks around for a beat. He walks all the way out into th water. Standing on rocks.

He looks over both shoulders, to make sure no one is watching. He then goes into his waistband and pulls out t Ziplock bag of weed. He squats down, opens the bag, and d it into the water. He watches as the green buds float off
Oscar walks up to the heavily crowded store entrance. We Sophina exiting holding a large cardboard cake box. Oscar takes it from her.
What flavor did you get.
Carrot cake.
Oscar looks at the cake box.
Why you didn't get ice cream?
Cause it aint your birthday nigga.
Can you take me by my grandma's house so I can get changed?
Yeah. You know it would be hella easier if you just had your stuff at my spot right. When you gonna move in.
Probably when you stop having trees in the car before we pick up T.
She gets into the car.

location: FIRST FRUIT LEARNING CENTER- BACKYARD- DAY- C

text: We follow Oscar as he turns the corner into a backyard fu of toys and KIDS Tatiana's age. Mrs. Stacey watches them, smiling, but with vigilant eyes. Tatiana spots Oscar and up and gives him a hug. Oscar waves and smiles at Mrs. Stacey, who waves back. He walks over to the sign out sheet and grabs a pen.
We played "Freeze Tag" today.
Oh yeah?
They couldn't catch me. Oscar looks up from the sign in sheet.
You think you're faster than daddy? Tatiana looks back at Oscar challengingly. Oscar looks at something behind Tatiana with concern.
What's that right there? Tatiana takes the bait- the oldest trick in the book. Osc takes off.

head_text.subj: EXT. FIRST FRUIT LEARNING CENTER- DAY

text: Oscar is beating Tatiana to the car by a mile. Tatiana follows him laughing loudly.
You cheated!

head_text.subj: INT. SOPHINA'S GRANDMOTHER'S HOUSE- KITCHEN- DAY

text: A small television sits next to the stove playing a Telenovella. Looking at the episode from the kitchen doorway is MARIAN PANGELINA, Sophina's 65 year old grandmother. SIZZLING ca heard coming from the kitchen. The front door opens, and walks Sophina, Oscar, and Tatiana.
Bisabuella!
Hola Tatiana! Tatiana runs to Mariana and gives her a hug. Oscar gives her a kiss on the cheek. Sophina gives her a The three take a seat at the kitchen table.
Mariana continues to cook.
Grandma, can you watch T tonight? We gonna go to Frisco. Mariana shakes her head.
Ask your sister.
But Rose got hella kids to watch.
But what's the difference between watching six kids, and watching seven? Sophina think about this.
(to Tatiana)
Quieres pasar la noche con sus primos? Tatiana nods. Sophina sighs, pulls out her cell phone, an heads out of the kitchen. Mariana turns to Oscar.
(to Oscar)
How's work?
You know... it's work.
Hmm. Oscar thinks on this, exits the kitchen in the direction Sophina. Only Tatiana is left at the table. Mariana smile At her. She puts some pollo on a fork, and takes it over her.

head_text.subj: INT. SOPHINA'S CHILDHOOD BEDROOM- MOMENTS LATER

text: As Oscar enters, we see Sophina is in her bra and panties talking into her cellphone. She lays several different outfits out on the bed. Oscar closes the bedroom door, le on it.
(into phone)
Alright... We'll be through there at like 10.. She hangs up her phone, and tosses it on the bed.
Rose gonna watch T. She looks through the clothes on her bed and lifts up a checkered hoodie, puts it to her chest. Looks at herself full body mirror, sighs at her reflection.
What you think?
(disinterested)
It's cool.
Sophina turns around and looks at Oscar, senses something eating at him. She puts the hoodie down, and walks over t him.
You okay? You been hella weird today.
Naw, I'm smooth. Just a little tired. Sophina's not buying it.
Osc. Wussup? Oscar looks at her for a beat. Cuts his eyes.
(to himself)
Fuck it. (to Sophina)
I lost my job. Sophina looks at him like he's speaking another language. for a long beat.
What the fuck you mean? Did they lay you off? Oscar doesn't say anything.
They doing cutbacks or some shit?
I got fired.
For what?
Showin up late. Missed a couple days when I had to get some money.
They told you today? Oscar waits a beat.
Keep it real, they fired me two weeks ago. Sophina's eyes get as wide as quarters.
My bad-
Don't fucking my bad me Osc! What was you doin when you was pretending to go to work? You know what? I don't even want to know.
I thought I was gonna be able to get my shit back. Sophina looks at him and shakes her head.
(to herself)
You think life a fucking joke... You think you're gonna get fired and then somebody is gona give you thier job back? What world do you live in?
Phina,
You aint shit, you know that? You lie to me, you lie to your fucking daughter. You don't give a fuck about us.
I didn't have to tell you shit.
So you would have just kept faking like you were going to work? And would have just been out bustin nocks? And doing whatever else, or WHOEVER else you do while I'm at work?
I thought you wanted the truth... But you ain't trying to hear that. Sophina doesn't know what to say to this.
I want you to be honest with me. But off top. From the fucking jump. Not after you lie for two weeks get cornered, and don't have a choice. (beat)
What did you today. Hmm. I bet you sold that fucking zip.
I dumped it. I'm done with that shit. I'm tired. That's what I'm trying to tell you. Thought I could start fresh today. But that shit aint working out. A long beat.
You threw it away? Oscar nods.
You tossed a whole zip of weed. And you don't have a job.
Oscar doesn't say anything. He smiles at this.
Oh my God I could slap you right now.
Sophina hugs him, he doesn't resist this time. Hugs her b
What are you gonna do?
I don't know? Something legal. Gonna see if my sister can hire me again, while I look. Maybe if I can just not fuck up, for 30 days.. Oprah said that's all it takes to form a habit, right?
Sophina laughs, Oscar kisses her.
Look at me.
Oscar looks at her closely.
You really done with that shit?
He nods.
You better be. Don't make me have to do this shit alone, again. I don't know if I can.
Oscar kisses her neck. Sophina reaches back and unhooks h bra. Oscar kisses her face, picks her up. Blue (6/13/2012)

head_text.subj: INT. SOPHINA'S GRANDMOTHER'S HOUSE- KITCHEN- DUSK

text: Mariana and Tatiana sit side by side at the table, spellb by the Telenovella. Pink (6/25/2012)                                       46

head_text.subj: EXT. GRANDMA BONNIE'S HOUSE- PORCH- NIGHT

text: Oscar, with Tatiana sitting on his shoulders, and a bag o crabs in his hand, walks up to the porch of a modest hous Sophina stands at his side holding a cake. Oscar uses his to open the door.

head_text.subj: INT. GRANDMA BONNIE'S HOUSE- ENTRANCE- NIGHT

text: The three enter the house and walk through the house into kitchen. Wanda, wearing casual clothes now, fills up a pot with wa Grandma Bonnie washes a basin full of vegetables.
Happy Birthday! Oscar takes Tatiana off her shoulders and sits her down. Everyone greets each other.

Hey baby. You guys are just in time. Oscar sits the crabs down on the counter next to the sink gives his mother a big bear hug. She smiles, hugs him bac just as tight. Oscar lets go and moves on to his grandmot Sophina and Tatiana come give Wanda hugs.

Oh my god, you guys got a cake too? Sophina blushes. Everyone laughs at this... even Ceephus. Wanda and Grandma Bonnie begin to take the groceries out the plastic bag. Wanda pulls out two massive crabs. Looks the bag and sees the third.
Osc. You know all I needed was two, you didn't have to spend so much money.
Don't trip, it wasn't that much. Oscar turns from the kitchen into the den. Pink (6/25/2012)

head_text.subj: INT. GRANDMA BONNIE'S HOUSE- DEN- NIGHT

text: Two men in their 50's sit down on the couch across from a playing ESPN. These are Oscar's uncles DARYL and CEEPHUS JOHNSON. Oscar walks over to a recliner adjacent to them pulls the Hallmark Bag out of his waistband. He sits down the recliner and signs his Mom's card.
Who you goin for in the Super Bowl Unc? Oscar watches, and waits for them to take the bait.
Steelers. Daryl shakes his head at this.
A Raiders fan, cheering for the Steelers.
Black uniforms, black players, black coach. Coach even has a black wife. I'm going with the Steelers.
You're insane, you know that? Oscar cracks up at this.

location: GRANDMA BONNIE'S HOUSE- KITCHEN- NIGHT- CONTI

text: Wanda and Sophina clean the crab with brushes and differe utensils. Grandma Bonnie starts up a roux in a large skil Uncle Daryl makes a large pitcher of lemonade from concentrate. Sophina and Oscar pull out glasses, dishes, utensils for everyone. Tatiana watches Oscar closely.

A large pot is placed atop the gas stove. The burner blaz under it, as Wanda drops the now clean crabs into the buc She drops in the vegetables and begins to stir. Bowls are grabbed by everyone and they are filled up by Wanda, with white rice first, and then the brown gumbo is poured over along with large pieces of un- cracked crab. Everyone eats their gumbo in the kitchen. Laughing talkin Wanda blows out the candles on her cake, cuts it, Hands o everyone a slice.

head_text.subj: INT. GRANDMA BONNIE'S HOUSE- DEN- HOURS LATER

text: Everyone is finishing up their cake, it's about half gone now. Oscar sits on the couch between Wanda and Sophina. Ceephus and Daryl now sit in plush chairs with metal fram pulled up next to the coffee table. Grandma Bonnie sits i recliner at the foot of the coffee table.
If somebody told me say twenty years ago, that I would live to see it happen, I'd have laughed in their face.
If somebody would have told me that two years ago I would have laughed in their face.
And here we are. 2008 and its happened.

But I think it's a sign of the times. The country is in bad enough shape for them to hand it over to a black guy. Look, if Bush hadn't have messed the country up so bad. Would he have even had a shot?
I think he still would have had a shot.
But would he have won though?
Well, I'm happy the did win. If the country really is as messed up as you say, I think he's our best chance of fixing it.
I keep thinking about how much it means for T.
When I was coming up, Teachers used to love to tell me, "You can be the President of the United States."
You'd make a great politician. You can talk your way out of anything. Sophina and Oscar share a look.

But I'll never forget, in my fourth grade classroom we had this poster. It had all 40 some odd presidents on that thang. And I looked at all they faces. And it was all white dudes. At that point, I realized my teachers was lying to me. (beat)
A part of me aint believed what no teacher has said to me since.
Now there will be a black face on those posters.
Well let's let him get in there first.
I know, I still feel like it's just too good to be true.
What's so good about it?
A black man, one of us has been elected president, fair and square. Ceephus shakes his head at this.

But he's not one of us. He wasn't affected by slavery. Wanda has had enough of this. She stands up and starts to grab everyone's plates. She heads into the kitchen to was Oscar watches her for a beat, then follows after her. Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

location: GRANDMA BONNIE'S HOUSE- KITCHEN- MOMENTS LATE

text: Wanda stands over the sink washing the dishes. Oscar stan next to her, drying them.
Thanks for your help tonight.
Oh, Come'on Ma, don't mention it. You shouldn't even be doing this.
I enjoy washing dishes. It's relaxing.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Oscar rolls his eyes at this. She hands him another dish.
I really enjoyed having you here. (beat)
You think it's safe for me to get used to having you around?
I told you. I aint missin no more parties. She looks at Oscar for a long beat, searching for the tru in his eyes. She finds it.
You guys got plans for tonight?
Yeah, nothing major. Gonna meet up with Cato, Jack, Jason and couple                       other cats. Head out to the City.
You guys gonna go OUT OUT?
Naw. We gonna keep it low key. Probably just catch the fireworks, and then roll around after that.
Roll around?
Yeah, just chill, we'll be cool. Sophina's got work in the morning too.
You guys gonna be drinking?
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
I'm sure they will. I'm not gonna be drinking. Wanda looks at Oscar, not buying it. Oscar laughs.
Why don't you catch BART out there? That way you can drink and hang out, and not have to worry about anything.
Yeah we might catch BART.
No traffic either. You know its gonna be crazy. Going and coming back.
Yeah, we might have to do it.
Promise me, if you and your friends go, you'll catch the train. (beat)
I'm serious.
Okay, I promise.
Aight. Don't make me follow you guys to make sure... you remember Prom. Oscar laughs at this so hard he has to sit the bowl. He p out his phone and starts to text.
Let's catch BART out there. Tell everybody to meet at South Hayward Station. He presses send. He picks the dish back up, and dries it. phone buzzes. He look at it.
Aight bet. We'll see you there in minute. Pink (6/25/2012)

location: GRANDMA BONNIE'S- HOUSE- DEN- 20 MINUTES LATE

text: Oscar, Sophina, and Tatiana say their good-byes to Grandm Bonnie, and Uncle Daryl and Uncle Ceephus. Oscar walks up to Wanda.
Alright we out, Birthday Girl. Love you.
Love you too, son. And Happy New Year. Oscar gives her a big hug and kiss, then turns and leads family out of the door. Wanda watches them, and shuts the door behind him.

Oscar drives through Hayward in silence, turning his whee Tatiana watches out of the backseat passenger window with solemn expression. She looks up at a bright flash of light in the sky. We se outside her window, a group of YOUNG TEENAGERS stand on a street corner and shoot off a Roman Candle.
Oscar and Sophina sit in the front seat of the car. They look tired. They look back at Tatiana who continues to lookout of the window.
(whispering)
You don't want to just call it a night? Sophina thinks about this. Shakes her head.
(whispering as well)
I want to go to the city... It's been a minute since we been out together too.
Alright. They both get out of the car. Oscar grabs Tatiana and wal up to the house. He rings the doorbell.

ROSE, Sophina's 27 year old sister, sits on the couch in front of a small television. She wears sweatpants and a p T shirt. Sprawled out a pallate of blankets and pillows on the car are Rose's kids, (all Hispanic) Lala (8) Issac (6) twins Eilly and Angelo (5), Alena (2). The doorbell rings, and Rose gets up off of the couch and opens up the door. Oscar bursts into the living room.
Happy New Year!!!! ARRRGHHHH!!!
Uncle Oscar!!!!! Rose's kids all jump up and growl back, mobbing Oscar, al smiles, clawing at his pants.
You gonna sleep over uncle Oscar? Oscar smiles at this, and shakes his head.

Pleeeaaaase mommy can Uncle Oscar spend the night? Oscar struggles for a bit, laughing, Tatiana jumps into t fray, helping her cousins tackle her Dad. Oscar, gives up laughing, and falls to the carpet. Rose and Sophina look on at this. Sophina laughs, Rose doesn't.
C'mon Osc, I just got them ready for bed...
Ok, ok, ok. My bad. Stop you guys. Time out.
You guys let your uncle up. The kids ease up on Oscar a bit. Oscar sits up, and looks Tatiana.
Let's brush those teeth.
No! She backs up smiling, and laughing.
You want your teeth to rot? And your breath to smell like gumbo?
Yes! Oscar looks at her seriously.
No you don't. Because then- THE
Oscar quickly moves in for the attack. Tickling Tatiana a picking her up. Rose's Kids laugh and follow Oscar toward
It is a modest bathroom. Oscar sits Tatiana on a wooden s in front of the sink. Tatiana gets ready to place the toothbrush into her mouth stops. She looks up at Oscar.
What?
You had gumbo, too. Oscar looks back at Tatiana guiltily.

head_text.subj: INT. ROSE'S HOUSE- BATHROOM- SECONDS LATER

text: Both Tatiana and Oscar stand side by side brushing their teeth, smiling while brushing. Oscar uses his finger. Pink (6/25/2012)
Oscar puts Tatiana into her pajamas. Sophina stands in th doorway watching them.
You guys aren't gonna sleep over too?
Me and Mommy are gonna go see some friends for a little bit. We'll be right back.
But I don't want you to go.
We'll be back, in a few hours I promise.
But you should go to bed. You already brushed your teeth. Remember?

I know, I know. But me and Mommy promised our friends we would go and visit them. We'll be back before you wake up, okay? Oscar leans over and gives Tatiana a kiss on the cheek. H gets up and gets ready to leave.
Nooo! Don't go. She grabs his arm. Tears well up in her eyes.
I'm scared.
Scared of what?
I hear guns outside.
Those are just firecrakers. You'll be safe inside.
But what about you daddy?
I'll be just fine. I'll tell you what, tomorrow when we wake up, we'll play "Candyland". And then guess what we can do after that?
Go to the park?
Better.
"Toys R Us?"
Better than that.
What?
Chuck e Cheese's. Tatiana cracks a gigantic smile.
Really?
I promise. We'll play all the games. And daddy's gonna give you lots of tokens okay?
Okay.
And me and you are gonna eat up all the pizza okay? We're gonna even eat mommy's pizza because she can't have carbs.
What's a carb?
Don't worry about that. Oscar stands up.
I'm gonna head out now baby, okay? Tatiana pouts.
You don't want to go in there with your cousins?
Tatiana shakes her head, still not happy about Oscar leav
I love you. He kisses her on the cheek.
Love you too Daddy. Oscar and Sophina leave the room. We hear them say bye to Rose.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

head_text.subj: EXT. SOUTH HAYWARD BART STATION PARKING LOT- LATER

text: We follow Oscar and Sophina as they approach a tough look group of 20 somethings. Among the group is Cato, Jason GR KRIS RAFFERTY, Brandon and Tim BRYSON, CARLOS REYES, and VANESSA RODRIGUEZ. Oscar approaches the group and greets everyone.
Yall ready? The group starts walking towards the BART turnstiles. Tal as they walk. Jason leans in and whispers to Cato.
I can't believe these niggas brought they broads. Finna be hella work in Frisco tonight. Vanessa takes a Tea Bottle from Carlos, her boyfriend.
You gonna slow down? I'm not dragging your drunk ass all over Frisco.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)                                  65
Brandon leans in to Kris and Tim.

Two Thousand Nine... don't even sound right bruh. But Twenty Ten? Twenty Ten is the year my nigga. We gettin it in, for Twenty Ten. See? Don't nothing even rhyme with Two Thousand Nine. Tim shakes his head.
What you said just rhymed, you dumb ass nigga!
Man fuck that. I'm boycottin 2009 bruh. Come twelve o' clock it's officially Twenty- Ten. We "gettin it in" in Twenty- Ten. Kris thinks about this.
What about Twenty Twenty though? That shit hard as fuck. Two twenties. We "gettin' plenty" in twenty twenty.
But that's skippin too many years bruh. You can't skip a whole decade. Brandon turns to Oscar.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Osc, Osc! Take a shot with ya bruh for the New Year. Oscar smiles, takes it. Drinks a small shot, and hands it back to Brandon. Brandon lifts the bottle up at Oscar lik toast.
To Twenty- Ten. He takes a quick swig. Oscar gives Brandon a "What the fu are you talking about" look. The group laughs at this, an follow Oscar's lead towards the station entrance.

location: SOUTH HAYWARD BART STATION LOBBY- CONTINUOUS

text: The group enters through the turnstiles, sticking their tickets in and retrieving them as they pass through. They head up the stairs towards the platform.

location: SOUTH HAYWARD BART STATION PLATFORM- CONTINUO

text: The San Francisco bound train is docked and a few passeng are still getting on to it.
Please stand clear, doors closing. Oscar runs up and stops the doors just as they are about close. He holds it while the rest of the group boards. Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND TRAIN- CAR 1- CONTINUOUS

text: Oscar boards, the doors close, and the train takes off. H looks around and sees the car is packed with COMMUTERS. H moves through the crowd to the back of the car he pulls o the doors and the group enters-

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND TRAIN- CAR 2- CONTINUOUS

text: Oscar looks around and heads over to some standing room n to where DANAE a gorgeous Black woman in her late 20's si wearing a ball gown and leather jacket. Across from her sit KAREN and DONALD, a White couple dres in similar clothing. There is an empty seat next to Danae but Oscar, Sophina, Tim, Kris, Vanessa, and Carlos all re standing. Brandon, however, slides into the empty seat. H puts his arm around Danae's seat.

Make sure you keep your hands to yourself... The group laughs at this. Danae turns and looks at Brando who is making a funny face at her. She can't hold in her smile. Brandon takes his arm down and offers her the bottle of Hennessy- she declines. He turns to Karen and Donald, and offers it. Donald opens his jacket and pulls out a flask. lifts it at Brandon, smiling. Brandon lifts his bottle in return. The both take a swig.
The BART train zooms by above street traffic.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART- TRAIN CAR 2- CONTIN

text: A few seats down from Oscar. Jason and Cato have found so company. LAUREN and ASHAE two super attractive Black girl their 20's sit next to each other. They pass a "Black and Mild" cigar back and forth. Cato and Jason hold onto the rails standing over them. Ca takes his joint from behind his ear, lights it.
You know it's illegal to smoke "Blacks" on BART right?
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
(laughing)
Is that right officer? Cato passes the lit joint to Jason.
But its cool. We'll let you slide cause its New Years and all. Ashae looks up at Jason.
I like your dreads. Jason passes her the joint. She takes it, puts her to her lips.
I like your everything. We should work something out. Ashae smiles and shakes her head as she takes a drag in. Lauren laughs.
We gay. Cato looks at them for a beat. He puts his arm around Jas
Shit, we gay too. We can do the whole gay thing together.
Collaboration... It'll be fun. Lauren and Ashae laugh at this. Not buying it for a secon
Yall not gay.
Real shit... watch... Cato turns to Oscar, who is hugged up with Sophina.
(shouting across the car)
Osc!! Osc my nigga!!! (motions to Jason)
Aint we gay?
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
(shouting back)
Yall niggas is Gay as Fuck! Everyone on the train laughs at this. Cato turns back to girls.
See?
Now approaching... West Oakland Station. The standing passengers brace themselves, as the train sl to a stop.

Sorry folks, there's gonnna be a slight delay while we sort out an issue with this other train. Hands open connecting car doors from the other side, revealing DARIUS, a tough looking Back teenager wearing a hoodie and a colorful backpack. He is followed by two oth BLACK TEENAGERS- his friends. Darius makes eye contact wi Oscar for a long beat... lifts his head. Oscar lifts his head back, and looks down at his phone: I reads 11:55pm.
We gon miss the countdown bruh.

We aint gonna miss shit, we can get it poppin right here. He presses a few buttons on his iPhone. It plays the MAC song "FEELIN MYSELF" he turns it up. Oscar's friends nod their heads to the music. Darius' face brightens up and he takes off his backpack, digs in it.
Wait, bruh. He pulls some laptop speakers out of his bag, leans over Danae, and plugs the jack into Brandon's phone. The MAC D now pumps through the whole car.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Right on lil bruh! More commuters start to dance, including Darius, and his friends, who move like professional "Turf" dancers.
The Bay Bridge and skyscrapers are beautifully illuminate the moonlight.

A group of hundreds of people are gathered on the pier overlooking the water. The group is mostly white though diverse in age: Teenagers, young families with kids in strollers, middle aged married couples, tweens. They check their wrist watches and cell phones periodical and look to the sky with anticipation.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART TRAIN- CAR 2- CONTIN

text: It's a party on BART. The train starts to move, and every CHEERS.
Wait, how we gonna do the countdown?
Use your phone bruh.
My phone don't got no seconds. Oscar looks around the car, zeroes in on Donald.
You bruh, you got a watch? Donald holds up his left wrist and nods his head. Oscar t to Brandon.
Turn the music off bruh!!! Brandon turns down the dial on the music. Blue (6/13/2012)
We see what the crowd is staring at- A large old fashione clock on the side of the Ferry Building reads 11:58. The minute hand ticks to 11:59pm.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART TRAIN- CAR 2

text: Oscar, Sophina and the other commuters are huddled around Donald, who is now standing up, watching the second hand on his watch, and waving his right finger like an orchest conductor.
Hundreds of faces look off into the sky with anticipation their eyes.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART TRAIN- CAR 2
EMBARCADERO ST./ FERRY BUILDING SAN FRANCISCO

text: A CHILD, white girl about 6 years old, points to somethin the sky, she smiles.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART TRAIN- CAR 2- SIMULT
EMBARCADERO ST./ FERRY BUILDING SAN FRANCISCO

text: A clear sky except for a small gray spec that slowly approaches the center of frame and suddenly...
BOOM! The spec explodes into a dazzling cluster of red an blue fireworks.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

location: EMBARCADERO ST./ FERRY BUILDING SAN FRANCISCO

text: The crowd looks on with wonder, their faces illuminated b the fireworks.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART TRAIN- CAR 2- SIMULT

text: HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!!!!!!!!
It's pandemonium. Everyone on the car is going crazy. Bra turns on the MAC DRE again.
Happy TWENTY- TEN!!! FUCK TWO THOUSAND NINE.
Donald gives Karen a peck on the lips. Lauren and Ashae k passionately, showing off. Cato and Jason record this wit their cell phones.

location: EMBARCADERO ST./ FERRY BUILDING SAN FRANCISCO

text: The fireworks are dazzling. Now greens, blues, purples, a whites, all beaming brilliantly. The crowd cheers in amazement. An ASIAN COUPLE kiss.

location: SAN FRANCISCO BOUND BART TRAIN- CAR 2- SIMULT

text: Oscar holds Sophina close.
Happy New Year baby.
Happy New Year, Osc.
They kiss.
Now approaching Montgomery Station.

Oscar and Sophina brace, as the train comes to a stop, al loosing their balance. They laugh at this. The doors open the group, along with the other passengers, exit the car. Goldenrod (7/19/2012)                                   7

head_text.subj: INT. MONTGOMERY STATION LOBBY- MOMENTS LATER

text: The group walks through the Bart Station Lobby, ahead A MUSICIAN sits in a chair playing an ERHU, a box full of dollar bills sits in front of him. As the group passes the Musician, Cato drops a dollar in hat.
Nigga, you could have gave that shit to me!
Learn how to play the guitar, and I got you bruh! The group steps onto an escalator, and we follow them up
The group exits the BART station and walks out onto the Downtown San Francisco street. PEDESTRIANS are everywhere
I gotta find somewhere to pee.
I gotta go too. We loose the group into the crowd of pedestrians.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

head_text.subj: EXT. SAN FRANCISCO LIQUOR STORE- MOMENTS LATER

text: Oscar looks from closed store to closed store, the group following closely behind him. He spots Sammy, Middle East Early 50's, closing the metal gates on his store. Oscar trots up ahead of the group to Sammy.
Say bruh.
We're all closed.
I know man, but a couple young ladies with me really got to use the bathroom man.
I'm all closed up, besides, I don't even have a rest room for customers.

But you got one for employees right? Sammy ignores him. Sophina, Vanessa, and the rest of the group gather behind Oscar now. Sammy shuts the gate and pulls out the key. Oscar sees this. He turns to Sophina and Vanessa who look if they are both about to explode. Oscar goes into his pocket. He pulls out a $10 bill.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

Look bruh, I aint rich. This my last ten dollars. All I got on me. Now you can take this $10, and open the store up and let them use the bathroom. Or you could go home, and when you get here tomorrow, its gonna be a puddle of piss right there. Oscar points to the ground in front of the door.
Cause they aint gonna piss on themselves bruh. Oscar holds out the money. Sammy turns and looks at him.
Just two girls? Oscar looks back to the group. Sophina and Vanessa step u meekly.
These two right here. Sammy looks them over for a beat.
Come on. He opens the gate and starts to unlock the door.
Thank you so much. He nods and opens up the door. Oscar steps over and tries hand him the $10 bill, but Sammy waves it off.
Its okay. Happy New Year.
Right on bruh. Happy New Year to you too. Thank you. He nods back at Oscar and walks into the store followed b the two girls. Oscar looks back at the group.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
A limo, filled with girls has pulled up down the street. Brandon walks up and tries to talk his way onto it. All t boys head over and talk to the girls, leaving Oscar by himself for a beat.

Please tell me this place has a bathroom. Oscar turns around sees PETER a white thirty something gu a North Face jacket. His wife STEPH, 30's is six months pregnant, and is doing the same potty dance we saw earlie from Vanessa. Oscar pounds on the glass door of the liquor store. Sammy walks out into view. He lifts his hands, "What?" Oscar points to Steph. Sammy opens up the door.
You gotta be kidding me.
She pregnant... Steph looks at him with puppy dog eyes. Sammy breaks down lets her in.
Thank you. Sammy turns to Oscar.
No more man. Oscar nods.
Thanks bro. Sammy closes the door.

Okay, okay. Please do whatever you can, okay? My son is a good boy.
Please do what you can. Please.
He nods and pats Wanda on the shoulder for a beat, then t and heads back into the ICU. Wanda walks back over to the group. She gives them the news from the doctor.

head_text.subj: INT. ICU RECOVERY ROOM- MORNING- FEW HOURS LATER

text: Several Nurses Operate around Oscar who still lies unconscious his breathing sounding more struggled than ev Suddenly blood begins to run from his right nostril, then right eyelid, and his left nostril after that. His EKG machine begins to BEEP loudly. The Nurses go into panic mode.
Early morning daylight streams into the waiting area. Whe Wanda, Sophina, Chantay, Ceephus, Daryl, and Oscar's frie hold hands. Wanda, leads them in prayer.
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

--and we ask that you may put your healing hands around your child, we ask that you may operate through these doctors, and breathe strength into their hands as they work on him. Heal him lord so that we may one day see his smile again.
Lines of blood trickle from Oscar's eyes, nose, and mouth The Lead is now in the room and has taken over commands.
Loosing a pulse.

Oscar's body begins to violently shake. A young male RESIDENT DOCTOR, grabs the paddles, the Lead Surgeon touches Oscar's chest, we see under his skin is filled with fluid. He taps the Resident Doctor on the shoulder and shakes his head. He looks up at the clock.
Calling it. Time of Death 9:01 am.
He pulls off his mask, frustrated, and walks out. Oscar's convulsions stop. A morbid, continuous beep echoes from t EKG.

head_text.subj: INT. ICU WAITING ROOM- DAY- MOMENTS LATER

text: The Lead Surgeon walks out, and Wanda is still in the cir praying. The Nurse goes over to her, pulls her aside. Wanda approaches the Lead Surgeon with a hopeful look in eyes. She reads his eyes for a beat. The Lead Surgeon looks at her for a beat. And shakes his head. Wanda puts her face in her hands, her legs wobble. Sophina who was watching and listening closely sees this. breaks down, buries her face in Oscar's hoodie. Daryl and Ceephus run over to Wanda, just as he arrives, legs buckle a bit, he catches her. Oscar's friends begin to break down.
Can I see him?
The Lead Surgeon nods.
But its a homicide, so they can't let you in the room with him, ok?
Wanda nods.
How many of you will be coming                         down.
Just me.
Wanda are you sure?
Wanda nods. Nurse looks at the Surgeon.
I can take her down.
He heads towards the exit doors with Wanda.

head_text.subj: INT. MORGUE HALLWAY- DAY- MOMENTS LATER

text: The Nurse   walks Wanda through a long corridor.
Wanda steps up to the glass and looks into it.
The MORTICIAN pulls back a white sheet, and we see Oscar' mangled Body lying on the slab.

I told him to catch the train. I told him to catch BART! I didn't know they were gonna hurt him. I didn't know. I should have just let him drive. I should have let him drive. I wanted him to be safe. Please please let me hug him.
Please let me go hug him. He didn't like to be alone!! I let my baby                       die alone!
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)

Sophina sits in a chair still smelling Oscar's hoodie, he head spinning. REPORTERS are starting to show up at the hospital. We see Katie there, still wearing the same clot talking to Brandon's father, pointing at her cellphone. Sophina looks up at a flat screen television in the hospi sees a report that showing Oscar's picture. She takes out her cellphone. Dials a number, puts it to h ear.
(into phone) Rose, don't turn on the TV okay? I'm coming to get T right now.
Sophina hangs up the phone and runs over to Brandon's fat
Can you to take me to my car?
He nods.

head_text.subj: INT. ROSE'S HOUSE- LIVING ROOM- DEN- MORNING

text: Sophina lets herself into the house. We see Rose in the bathroom sitting on the stool, grief-stricken. Sophina tu into the den, where Tatiana and her cousins are still asl She steps over them to get to Tatiana.
T, come on.
Tatiana groggily wakes up. Sophina picks her up.
Sophina walks in and looks around the house. Tatiana walk inside. And goes straight for Oscar and Sophina's bedroom
Goldenrod (7/19/2012)
Daddy? Daddy? Time to go to "Chuck E Cheese"!
Tatiana comes out of the bedroom looking confused.
Where's Daddy?
Come on T, we gotta take a shower.
The same shower from earlier. Sophina turns the water on, helps Tatiana with her clothes, and puts her in. She take off her own clothes and steps in as well.
Is the water okay T?
Yeah. Where's daddy? Is he on vacation again?
No.
Sophina tries to find her words. Lets the water run on he face for a bit, then rubs down the friz in Tatiana's hair
Remember when I told you about God... and the angels?
Yeah.
And about how when we die we go to heaven?
Yeah.
Well, God needed another angel, so he took Daddy to come and live in heaven with him.
Tatiana looks at Sophina for a long beat.
But I don't want Daddy to live in heaven. I want him to be with me.
He can't. Once you go to heaven, you can't come back.
Tatiana thinks about this.
Well does he have his cellphone? Maybe if I call him and talk to him, he will come back.
No. Daddy doesn't have his cellphone baby. You can't call him where he is.
